drugs.name: paracetamol
drugs.notes: Safe during pregnancy and breastfeeding.

drugs.name: ibuprofen
drugs.notes: May cause fetal circulation issues in late pregnancy.

drugs.name: diclofenac
drugs.notes: Risky during pregnancy, use with caution during breastfeeding.

drugs.name: acetaminophen
drugs.notes: Same as paracetamol.

drugs.name: solpadeine
drugs.notes: Contains codeine and caffeine; not recommended during pregnancy and breastfeeding.

drugs.name: amoxicillin
drugs.notes: Common and safe antibiotic.

drugs.name: cephalexin
drugs.notes: Safe cephalosporin antibiotic.

drugs.name: tetracycline
drugs.notes: Can affect fetal bone and teeth.

drugs.name: hydrocortisone
drugs.notes: Mild topical steroid.

drugs.name: clotrimazole
drugs.notes: Topical antifungal.

drugs.name: isotretinoin
drugs.notes: Highly teratogenic, avoid during pregnancy and breastfeeding.

drugs.name: clindamycin
drugs.notes: Safe topical antibiotic.

drugs.name: fluoxetine
drugs.notes: Relatively safe SSRI.

drugs.name: sertraline
drugs.notes: Preferred SSRI during pregnancy.

drugs.name: lorazepam
drugs.notes: Can cause sedation in baby, avoid during pregnancy and breastfeeding.

drugs.name: buspirone
drugs.notes: Safe anti-anxiety option.

drugs.name: doxylamine_b6
drugs.notes: First-line for pregnancy nausea.

drugs.name: ondansetron
drugs.notes: Not preferred in first trimester, use cautiously in breastfeeding.

drugs.name: meclizine
drugs.notes: For motion sickness and nausea during pregnancy.

drugs.name: ranitidine
drugs.notes: Withdrawn in some countries due to safety concerns.

drugs.name: famotidine
drugs.notes: Safe for acid reflux, used with caution in pregnancy.

drugs.name: omeprazole
drugs.notes: Proton pump inhibitor, relatively safe during pregnancy and breastfeeding.

drugs.name: propranolol
drugs.notes: Used with caution for hypertension and anxiety during pregnancy and breastfeeding.

drugs.name: cetirizine
drugs.notes: Second-generation antihistamine, safe during pregnancy and breastfeeding.

drugs.name: diphenhydramine
drugs.notes: May cause sedation, not preferred during pregnancy and breastfeeding.

drugs.name: metformin
drugs.notes: First-line treatment for type 2 diabetes; safe during pregnancy and breastfeeding.

drugs.name: insulin
drugs.notes: Safe and commonly used for gestational and type 1/2 diabetes.

drugs.name: glibenclamide
drugs.notes: Not recommended during pregnancy or breastfeeding.

drugs.name: gliclazide
drugs.notes: Avoid during pregnancy and breastfeeding.
